item.name: 查询第四节课的次数
item.description: 防止个别教师第四节课太多
item.sql: select t.教师姓名,r.次数 from ( select max(teacher_id) as teacher_id, count(*) 次数 from schedule where section=3 group by teacher_id) as r inner join teacher as t on t.教师编号=r.teacher_id order by r."次数" desc;

item.name: 查询课程不在同一个半天的教师
item.description: 防止个别教师出现多次课程不在同一个半天
item.sql: SELECT r.dow+1 as 星期, t.教师姓名 教师, r.forenoon 上午, r.afternoon 下午 FROM ( SELECT max(day_of_week) dow, max(teacher_id) ti, count(forenoon) forenoon, count(afternoon) afternoon FROM ( SELECT day_of_week, teacher_id, CASE WHEN section < 4 THEN 1 END AS forenoon, CASE WHEN section >= 4 THEN 1 END AS afternoon FROM schedule ) AS s GROUP BY day_of_week, teacher_id HAVING count(forenoon) > 0 AND count(afternoon) > 0 ) AS r INNER JOIN teacher AS t ON r.ti = t."教师编号" ORDER BY r.ti;

item.name: 查询年级任课教师一览表
item.sql:
SELECT 班级+1 as 班级, max( CASE WHEN 学科名字 = '语文' THEN 教师姓名 ELSE '' END ) AS 语文, max( CASE WHEN 学科名字 = '数学' THEN 教师姓名 ELSE '' END ) AS 数学, max( CASE WHEN 学科名字 = '英语' THEN 教师姓名 ELSE '' END ) AS 英语, max( CASE WHEN 学科名字 = '物理' THEN 教师姓名 ELSE '' END ) AS 物理, max( CASE WHEN 学科名字 = '化学' THEN 教师姓名 ELSE '' END ) AS 化学, max( CASE WHEN 学科名字 = '生物' THEN 教师姓名 ELSE '' END ) AS 生物, max( CASE WHEN 学科名字 = '政治' THEN 教师姓名 ELSE '' END ) AS 政治, max( CASE WHEN 学科名字 = '历史' THEN 教师姓名 ELSE '' END ) AS 历史, max( CASE WHEN 学科名字 = '地理' THEN 教师姓名 ELSE '' END ) AS 地理, max( CASE WHEN 学科名字 = '体育' THEN 教师姓名 ELSE '' END ) AS 体育
FROM class_course GROUP BY 班级

item.name: 中层干部确保没有周一上午第二三四节
item.sql: SELECT --count(*) AS 节数 t.教师姓名 FROM schedule s LEFT JOIN teacher t ON s.teacher_id = t.教师编号 WHERE --星期几 s.day_of_week = 0 --第几节课 AND s.section in (1,2,3) and t.教师姓名 in ( '胡香平', '罗才发', '沈阳', '邓建华', '邓大学', '刘海设', '李姣娥', '戴金山', '祝大桥', '肖攀东', '黄建平', '熊英平' )

item.name: 查询非班主任教师在周六下午的
item.description: 尽量确保周六下午都是班主任的课
item.sql: SELECT s.class_id+1 as 班级,s.day_of_week+1 星期,s.section+1 节次,t.教师姓名 FROM schedule s inner JOIN teacher t ON s.teacher_id = t.教师编号 WHERE s.day_of_week = 5 AND s.section>3 and t.教师姓名 not in (select 教师姓名 from class_course where 班主任=1) and s.teacher_id<>0 order by 教师姓名

item.name: 查询周六的课不在同一个半天的教师
item.description: 尽量确保周六的课在同一个半天，英语可例外。
item.sql:
SELECT r.dow+1 as 星期, t.教师姓名 教师, r.forenoon 上午节数, r.afternoon 下午节数 FROM ( SELECT max(day_of_week) dow, max(teacher_id) ti, count(forenoon) forenoon, count(afternoon) afternoon FROM ( SELECT day_of_week, teacher_id, CASE WHEN section < 4 THEN 1 END AS forenoon, CASE WHEN section >= 4 THEN 1 END AS afternoon FROM schedule where day_of_week=5 ) AS s GROUP BY day_of_week, teacher_id HAVING count(forenoon) > 0 AND count(afternoon) > 0 ) AS r INNER JOIN teacher AS t ON r.ti = t."教师编号"
ORDER BY r.ti;

item.name: 查询信息课是否在一节安排了两个班以上同时上课
item.description: 信息只有两个教室，所以保证同时上课的班级数小于等于2
item.sql: SELECT min(s.class_id) 班级, max(s.day_of_week) + 1 AS 星期, max(s.section) + 1 AS 节次, max(t.学科名字) 学科, count(*) AS 重复节数 FROM schedule AS s INNER JOIN teacher AS t ON s.teacher_id = t.教师编号 GROUP BY day_of_week, section, 学科名字 HAVING count(学科名字) > 2 AND 学科名字 = '信息'

item.name: 查询音乐课是否在一节安排了两个班以上同时上课
item.description: 音乐只有两个教室，所以保证同时上课的班级数小于等于2
item.sql: SELECT min(s.class_id) 班级, max(s.day_of_week) + 1 AS 星期, max(s.section) + 1 AS 节次, max(t.学科名字) 学科, count(*) AS 重复节数 FROM schedule AS s INNER JOIN teacher AS t ON s.teacher_id = t.教师编号 GROUP BY day_of_week, section, 学科名字 HAVING count(学科名字) > 2 AND 学科名字 = '音乐'

item.name: 查询体育音乐信息是否有周六的课
item.description: 体音美原则上不安排在周六
item.sql: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.class_id + 1 AS 班级, s.day_of_week + 1 AS 星期, s.section + 1 AS 节次, t.学科名字 AS 学科 FROM schedule AS s INNER JOIN teacher AS t ON s.teacher_id = t.教师编号 ) AS res WHERE res.学科 IN ('体育', '音乐', '信息','公共') AND res.星期 = 6;

item.name: 检查周一第7节有无班主任的课
item.sql: SELECT schedule.class_id, schedule.day_of_week, schedule.section, teacher."教师姓名", class_course.班主任 FROM schedule INNER JOIN teacher ON schedule.teacher_id = teacher.教师编号 INNER JOIN class_course ON teacher."教师姓名" = class_course.教师姓名 WHERE day_of_week = 0 AND section = 6 AND 班主任 = 1;

item.name: 检查英语非班主任老师有无周六下午的课
item.description: 英语要上周六早自习,所以不安排下午的课
item.sql: SELECT s.class_id+1 as 班级,s.day_of_week+1 星期,s.section+1 节次,t.教师姓名 FROM schedule s inner JOIN teacher t ON s.teacher_id = t.教师编号 WHERE s.day_of_week = 5 AND s.section>3 and t.教师姓名 not in (select 教师姓名 from class_course where 班主任=1) and s.teacher_id<>0 and t."学科名字"='英语' order by 教师姓名

item.description: 尽量安排班主任上周六下午的课
item.sql: SELECT s.class_id+1 as 班级,s.day_of_week+1 星期,s.section+1 节次,t.教师姓名 FROM schedule s inner JOIN teacher t ON s.teacher_id = t.教师编号 WHERE s.day_of_week = 5 AND s.section>3 and t.教师姓名 not in (select 教师姓名 from class_course where 班主任=1) and s.teacher_id<>0 order by 教师姓名

item.name: 检查班主任老师有无周六上午的课
item.description: 尽量安排班主任上周六下午的课
item.sql: SELECT s.class_id+1 as 班级,s.day_of_week+1 星期,s.section+1 节次,t.教师姓名 FROM schedule s inner JOIN teacher t ON s.teacher_id = t.教师编号 WHERE s.day_of_week = 5 AND s.section<4 and t.教师姓名 in (select 教师姓名 from class_course where 班主任=1) and s.teacher_id<>0 order by 教师姓名
